00016 Component* TriangleRenderableCreator::createComponent(const string& name)
00017 {
00018     TriangleRenderable* ret = new TriangleRenderable(name);
00019     SceneManager::get()->registerRenderableListener(ret);
00020     return ret;
00021 }
00022 
00023 Component* TriangleRenderableCreator::copyComponent(const string& name, Component* com)
00024 {
00025     TriangleRenderable* original = static_cast<TriangleRenderable*>(com);
00026 
00027     TriangleRenderable* copy = new TriangleRenderable(name);
00028 
00029     vector<Triangle*> triangles = original->getTriangles();
00030     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < triangles.size(); ++i)
00031     {
00032         Triangle* tri = triangles[i];
00033         copy->addTriangle(tri->vert1, tri->vert2, tri->vert3, tri->uv1, tri->uv2, tri->uv3,
00034                           tri->color1, tri->color2, tri->color3, tri->textureHandle, tri->blendMode);
00035     }
00036 
00037     SceneManager::get()->registerRenderableListener(copy);
00038 
00039     return copy;
00040 }
